skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dryer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this Home Connect skill for Amazon Alexa, you can control and monitor the most important programs and functions of your dryer.

Features:
* Support of many programs and options (depending on your model)
* Use your dryer in Alexa routines: turn it on (only supported by certain dryers), off or start a program
* Easy and natural interaction with the appliance:
 ** Adjust program settings without starting
 ** Use the programs and selections you already made on the dryer's panel
* Find out when your laundry will be ready ("Alexa, ask My Dryer when it will be done")
* Shortcut: You can enter Assist mode without launching the skill beforehand ("Alexa, tell My Dryer to assist me")
* Contextual help messages: Say "more" or "help" to get further information at any point in the dialogue
* Stop finished program signal ("Alexa, tell My Dryer to stop beeping")
* Support of Home Connect Smart Dry/intelligentDry technology. The dryer can automatically select an ideal drying program based on the information about the last washing cycle received from a connected washing machine. ("Alexa, tell my dryer to use Smart Dry"). Please note that this features is not supported by all dryers
* Decide on subject of information that you expect to receive Alexa Notifications about: program is finished or action needed

Selection of supported commands:
"Alexa, ask My Dryer how long is left."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to start."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to start the cottons program."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to use cottons with cupboard dry."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to be done in 4 hours."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to start the Mix program with Iron Dry and finish in six hours."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to use time dry warm for 30 minutes."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to use Gentle Dry."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to stop beeping."
"Alexa, ask My Dryer to turn off."
"Alexa, ask My Dryer for the status."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer to activate notifications."
"Alexa, tell My Dryer I want to reload."

Shorter commands for Alexa Smart Home:
"Alexa, turn on Dryer" (only supported by certain dryers)
"Alexa, turn off Dryer"
* Use the name you chose for your dryer in the Alexa app

Further tips:
* In order to use this skill, you need to link your Home Connect account to Alexa. You can register an account in the Home Connect app. Please also make sure that you pair your dryer with the Home Connect app.
* If you have any issues with the skill, please try re-enabling it.
* On some models, the child lock functionality is not supported. Please make sure that your child does not play with the Skill.
* This skill supports dryer models with the Home Connect functionality from Bosch, Siemens, Neff, Gaggenau and Thermador.

Please be aware that the skill might not support all home appliance features as available in the Home Connect app. We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience. If you have any questions or comments regarding the skill, please send them via email to the support address below.
